name: A World of One-Way
description:
A short logic game written specifically for the ASM 2021 competition for a ZX-Spectrum computer 16kb. (runs on any ZX-Spectrum computer/emulator)

Controls:

  • Sinclair I
  • Sinclair II
  • QAOP
  • Caps + Enter to main menu.
An open source game written in Z80 assembler.
